author: Special Correspondent
title: Nod for mills to resume operations
description: The Thoothukudi district administration has started permitting rice, oil and dhal mills to resume operations, which were suspended in the wake of a nationwide lockdown, Minister for Information and Pu
content:
The Thoothukudi district administration has started permitting rice, oil and dhal mills to resume operations, which were suspended in the wake of a nationwide lockdown, Minister for Information and Public Relations Kadambur C. Raju said on Monday.
